agreement_text:
Acceptance of any contribution, gift or grant is at the discretion of the Endangered Species Revenge. The Endangered Species Revenge will not accept any gift unless it can be used or expended consistently with the purpose and mission of the Endangered Species Revenge.

No irrevocable gift, whether outright or life-income in character, will be accepted if under any reasonable set of circumstances the gift would jeopardize the donor’s financial security.

The Endangered Species Revenge will refrain from providing advice about the tax or other treatment of gifts and will encourage donors to seek guidance from their own professional advisers to assist them in the process of making their donation.

The Endangered Species Revenge will accept donations of cash or publicly traded securities. Gifts of in-kind services will be accepted at the discretion of the Endangered Species Revenge.

Certain other gifts, real property, personal property, in-kind gifts, non-liquid securities, and contributions whose sources are not transparent or whose use is restricted in some manner, must be reviewed prior to acceptance due to the special obligations raised or liabilities they may pose for Endangered Species Revenge.

The Endangered Species Revenge will provide acknowledgments to donors meeting tax requirements for property received by the charity as a gift. However, except for gifts of cash and publicly traded securities, no value shall be ascribed to any receipt or other form of substantiation of a gift received by Endangered Species Revenge.

The Endangered Species Revenge will respect the intent of the donor relating to gifts for restricted purposes and those relating to the desire to remain anonymous. With respect to anonymous gifts, the Endangered Species Revenge will restrict information about the donor to only those staff members with a need to know.

The Endangered Species Revenge will not compensate, whether through commissions, finders' fees, or other means, any third party for directing a gift or a donor to the Endangered Species Revenge.
global_offline_donation_content:
Please make your check payable to:

Endangered Species Revenge, Foundation
45 Rockefeller Plaza, 20th Floor
New York, NY 10111

In the memo line of your check, please write the name of the animal you wish to help, or leave this line blank to help the animal that needs it most.

All contributions will be gratefully acknowledged and are tax deductible.

Thank you!
offline-donation-instruction_email_messa:
Dear {name}, Thank you for your check donation request! Your generosity is greatly appreciated. In order to make an offline donation we ask that you please follow these instructions:
  1. Make a check payable to "ESR"
  2. On the memo line of the check, please indicate that the donation is for "ESR"
  3. Please mail your check to:
ESR 45 Rockefeller Plaza, 20th Floor New York, NY 10111 Once your donation has been received we will mark it as complete and you will receive an email receipt for your records. Please contact us with any questions you may have! Sincerely, ESR
